name: Sreshta Reddy

services.title: AI & Machine Learning
services.description: Development of NLP models, speech recognition systems, and other AI-powered applications with a focus on regional language support.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end web application development using modern frameworks like React.js and Django, with focus on responsive design and clean architecture.

services.title: Systems Programming
services.description: Building high-performance computing solutions, including multithreaded applications, proxy systems, and optimized backend services.

services.title: Data Visualization
services.description: Creating interactive 3D visualizations and data representations that enhance user engagement and improve information communication.

aboutpara: I'm a Computer Science student at Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women, passionate about developing AI solutions and building robust software systems. With experience in software development and natural language processing, I enjoy taking on complex challenges and creating innovative solutions. I've worked on projects ranging from multithreaded web servers to spectral analysis applications, always focusing on efficiency and user experience. I'm skilled in multiple programming languages including Python, Java, and JavaScript, and have experience with frameworks like React.js and Django. I'm particularly interested in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and their applications in solving real-world problems.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹ I'm a computer science student specializing in AI and full-stack development.
resume.description: I'm passionate about creating technology solutions that make a difference. I have experience in AI model development, web application development, and systems programming.

bullets: Developed Telugu language models and text-to-speech (TTS) technologies, improving speech accuracy by 20% and accessibility for 5,000+ users
Conducted NLP model testing and evaluation, ensuring 99% accuracy in regional language applications
Optimized AI models using TensorFlow and PyTorch, improving efficiency in low-resource environments
Developed a full-stack web application that analyzes spectral data to uncover historical insights from ancient civilizations
Designed 3D interactive visualizations using Three.js, enhancing user engagement by 35%
Built a RESTful API in Django for seamless data retrieval & processing, integrated with a React.js front-end
Developed a multithreaded proxy web server in C using TCP/IP sockets for efficient client-server communication
Implemented a Least Recently Used (LRU) cache, improving response times by 40% and reducing backend load
Utilized POSIX threads, semaphores, and mutex locks to ensure thread safety and reliability

education.universityName: Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women
education.universityPara: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science with a GPA of 8.5/10.0. Relevant coursework includes Software Engineering, Operating Systems, Algorithms, and Artificial Intelligence.
